channel.title: Idea Machine on Chris Palmieri
channel.description: Recent content in Idea Machine on Chris Palmieri

item.title: 12 Ideas to Improve Clipchamp
item.description: This is part of the Idea Machine, an ongoing series of short posts inspired by a James Altucher article titled Write Ten Ideas Every Day And Within Three Months You Will Have Rewired Your Brain. Each post simply shares 10 (or more) ideas with a different company/product team/writer/business leader whose work I find interesting, or for a product I wish existed. Listening to instrumental beats while watching the news, letures or other educational videos is something I have always done.
